effect:
Cute, Good, Human, Male, Quincy, Student

Deplete, discard a card from your hand: If the boost value on the discarded card matches the attacker's stat, you take no power damage from this attack. Use only while you have less characters in your party than your opponent.

name: Uryu - Master of Sewing
effect:
Cute, Good, Human, Male, Quincy, Student

Your opponent's effects cannot remove Animals in your discard pile from the game.

name: Uryu - Outside
effect:
Cute, Good, Human, Male, Quincy, Student

When Uryu enters and leaves play, return one of your opponent's battlegrounds to his hand. Use only while you have 2 or more Quincies in your party. (*) Your opponent loses 2 power when he plays a battleground.

name: Uryu - Shocked
effect:
Cute, Good, Human, Male, Quincy, Student

When one of your Quincies leaves play, your opponent discards a card from his hand and loses power equal to its boost value.

name: Warm Welcome
effect: You may return any number of your energy to your side deck. Gain power equal to the number of energy you returned by this effect. If your guardian is Retsu Unohana, you gain twice as much power instead.

name: Yoruichi - Helpful
effect:
Cute, Female, Good, Human

You do not lose power the first time you use the effect of your Yoruichi Shihoin guardian each turn.

name: Yoruichi - Irritated
effect:
Animal, Cute, Good

When an opponent's effect depletes a Good or Cute character in your party, you may renew Yoruichi. If the character depleted was Jinta, Tessai, Ururu, Renji or Kisuke, you may also deplete a character in your opponent's party.

name: Yoruichi - Quick
effect:
Animal, Cute, Good

(You may play Yoruichi anytime you could play an event.) Other Animals in your party get +2 to all stats.

name: Yoruichi - Unabashed
effect:
Cute, Female, Good, Human

Reveal your hand to your opponent: Yoruichi gains +4 to all stats this battle. Use only while you have 1 or more other Cute Females in your party. Limit once per turn.

name: Yoshino - Disturbed
effect:
Bount, Cute, Evil, Female, Human

Yoshino cannot be depleted or discarded by your opponent's effects while you have 10 or more Souls.

name: Yoshino - Inviting
effect:
Bount, Cute, Evil, Female, Human

Yoshino gets +1 to all stats while you have 5 or more Souls.

name: Yoshino - Up Close
effect:
Bount, Cute, Evil, Female, Human

Deplete: Discard a character in your opponent's party that has an energy cost less than the number of Souls you have.

name: Yoshino Soma
effect:
Guardian's Power: 37

At the start of your turn, you may collect any characters in your discard pile or hand as Souls. (*) 1 Soul: Your Bount characters that are Souls count as 2 Souls instead of 1 this turn.

name: Yuzu - Watching
effect:
Cute, Female, Good, Human

Deplete: Search your deck for a battleground and put it in your hand. Use only when one of your Non-Student Humans leaves play.
